statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerData;
SELECT full_name, email, age FROM CustomerData WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT location, age, email FROM CustomerData ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, location FROM CustomerData WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerData;
SELECT full_name, email, age FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, age, email FROM CustomerData WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, gender FROM CustomerData WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchases GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_name, email, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, customer_id FROM purchases WHERE price <= 100.00;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget >= 5000.00 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 1000 AND quantity > 5 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 AND start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC, customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, city, country FROM demographics WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, city, country FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE demographics.age > 30
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, product_name, price, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_group FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, registration_date FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, city, country FROM demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY city, country DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.gender, d.age FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.age > 30 AND d.country = 'USA';
